Package org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChannelSelector<T extends IOReadableWritable>
    Objects implementing this interface are passed to an OutputGate.
    MutableReader<T extends IOReadableWritable>  
    Reader<T extends IOReadableWritable>
    A reader interface to read records from an input.
    ReaderBase  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRecordReader
    This is an abstract base class for a record reader, either dealing with mutable or immutable records, and dealing with reads from single gates (single end points) or multiple gates (union).
    AbstractSingleGateRecordReader<T extends IOReadableWritable>
    This is an abstract base class for a record reader, either dealing with mutable or immutable records.
    AbstractUnionRecordReader<T extends IOReadableWritable>  
    BufferWriter  
    MutableRecordReader<T extends IOReadableWritable>  
    MutableUnionRecordReader<T extends IOReadableWritable>  
    RecordReader<T extends IOReadableWritable>
    A record writer connects an input gate to an application.
    RecordWriter<T extends IOReadableWritable>
    A record writer connects the application to an output gate.
    RoundRobinChannelSelector<T extends IOReadableWritable>
    This is the default implementation of the ChannelSelector interface.
    UnionRecordReader<T extends IOReadableWritable>
